languages.text: Когни-броня, управляемая мудрым и заботливым машинным духом. Он бдительно следит за физическим состоянием носителя и при необходимости спешит впрыснуть в его артерии порцию стимуляторов-регенераторов.

Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.
languages.original_text: Когни-броня, управляемая мудрым и заботливым машинным духом. Он бдительно следит за физическим состоянием носителя и при необходимости спешит впрыснуть в его артерии порцию стимуляторов-регенераторов.

traits.locale_text: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

languages.text: Cogniarmadura controlada por un espíritu máquina sabio y cuidadoso. Vigila constantemente el estado físico de su portador e inyecta estimulantes regeneradores a sus arterias siempre que hace falta.
languages.original_text: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

traits.locale_text: Cogniarmadura controlada por un espíritu máquina sabio y cuidadoso. Vigila constantemente el estado físico de su portador e inyecta estimulantes regeneradores a sus arterias siempre que hace falta.

languages.text: Une cogni-armure contrôlée par un esprit de la machine sage et bienveillant. Il surveille attentivement l'état physique de son porteur et, en cas de blessure, lui injecte une dose d'agents régénérants et stimulants directement dans les artères.
languages.original_text: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

traits.locale_text: Une cogni-armure contrôlée par un esprit de la machine sage et bienveillant. Il surveille attentivement l’état physique de son porteur et, en cas de blessure, lui injecte une dose d'agents régénérants et stimulants directement dans les artères.

languages.text: 由聪明、体贴的机魂操控的认知护甲。它会尽职尽责地监测装备者的各项体征，并在必要时及时注射兴奋剂，让装备者重新焕发生机。
languages.original_text: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

traits.locale_text: 由聪明、体贴的机魂操控的认知护甲。它会尽职尽责地监测装备者的各项体征，并在必要时及时注射兴奋剂，让装备者重新焕发生机。

languages.text: 聡明かつ思いやりのある機械精霊によって制御されるコグニ・アーマー。着用者の体調を忠実に監視し、必要な場合はいつでも、再生促進剤を動脈に注入する。
languages.original_text: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

traits.locale_text: 聡明かつ思いやりのある機械精霊によって制御されるコグニ・アーマー。着用者の体調を忠実に監視し、必要な場合はいつでも、再生促進剤を動脈に注入する。

languages.text: Cogni-Rüstung, die von einem weisen und fürsorglichen Maschinengeist kontrolliert. Er überwacht pflichtbewusst den körperlichen Zustand des Trägers und injiziert wenn nötig sofort eine Dosis belebender Stimulanzien in die Arterien.
languages.original_text: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

traits.locale_text: Cogni-Rüstung, die von einem weisen und fürsorglichen Maschinengeist kontrolliert. Er überwacht pflichtbewusst den körperlichen Zustand des Trägers und injiziert wenn nötig sofort eine Dosis belebender Stimulanzien in die Arterien.

languages.text: Bilge ve şefkatli bir makine ruhu tarafından kontrol edilen kavrazırh. Giyenin fiziksel durumunu titizlikle izler ve gerektiğinde anında atardamarlarına bir doz vücudu onaran uyarıcı enjekte eder.
languages.original_text: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.
